events.name: gateway.payment_voided
events.description: Occurs when a void is successful.

events.name: gateway.payment_void_declined
events.description: Occurs when a submitted void request has been rejected by the scheme. This webhook can only happen after a successful authorisation and before the capture.

events.name: gateway.payment_returned
events.description: Only occurs when a payment is returned by a Pay to Bank (PTB) payment, or by some alternative payment methods (APMs) that support a failure after success scenarios (such as Automated Clearing House (ACH)). These returns are triggered outside of Checkout.

events.name: gateway.payment_refunded
events.description: Occurs when a refund is successful.

events.name: gateway.payment_refund_pending
events.description: Occurs when a refund request has been successfully initiated.

events.name: gateway.payment_refund_declined
events.description: Occurs when a refund is declined.

events.name: gateway.payment_pending
events.description: Occurs when an asynchronous payment request has successfully initiated (e.g. a payment that requires an additional action to complete it, such as a cardholder completing a redirect to an alternative payment method's checkout page).

events.name: gateway.payment_paid
events.description: Only occurs for bank payout payments.

events.name: gateway.payment_expired
events.description: Occurs when an APM payment has expired (not applicable to 3DS payment expiries).

events.name: gateway.payment_declined
events.description: Occurs when a payment authorization request times out, or if there is a rejection during authorization (e.g. insufficient_funds, do_not_honor, card_blocked_by_issuer).

events.name: gateway.payment_captured
events.description: Occurs when a capture is successful.

events.name: gateway.payment_capture_pending
events.description: Occurs when the customer has approved the payment on the banking page.

events.name: gateway.payment_capture_declined
events.description: Occurs when a capture is declined.

events.name: gateway.payment_canceled
events.description: Occurs when the customer has canceled the payment via a provider's platform. This webhook is triggered in some APM flows.

events.name: gateway.payment_authorization_incremented
events.description: Occurs when an authorization is successfully incremented.

events.name: gateway.payment_authorization_increment_declined
events.description: Occurs when an authorization is declined.

events.name: gateway.payment_approved
events.description: Occurs when an authorization for a payment is successfully approved. It can be followed by one of the following webhooks: payment_captured, payment_voided, payment_authorization_incremented, payment_authorization_increment_declined.

events.name: gateway.card_verified
events.description: Occurs when a card verification is successful.

events.name: gateway.card_verification_declined
events.description: Occurs when a card verification is declined.

events.name: platforms.sub_entity_created
events.description: The sub-entity has been created successfully.

events.name: platforms.payments_enabled
events.description: Occurs when payment capabilities are enabled for a sub-entity.

events.name: platforms.payments_disabled
events.description: Occurs when payment capabilities are disabled for a sub-entity.

events.name: platforms.payouts_enabled
events.description: Occurs when payout capabilities are enabled for a sub-entity.

events.name: platforms.payouts_disabled
events.description: Occurs when payout capabilities are disabled for a sub-entity.

events.name: platforms.vmss_passed
events.description: Occurs when a sub-entity passes due diligence VMSS checks.

events.name: platforms.vmss_failed
events.description: Occurs when a sub-entity fails due diligence VMSS checks.

events.name: platforms.match_passed
events.description: The sub-entity has passed their MATCH check.

events.name: platforms.match_failed
events.description: The sub-entity has failed their MATCH check.

events.name: platforms.full_dd_passed
events.description: The sub-entity has passed their due diligence checks.

events.name: platforms.full_dd_failed
events.description: The sub-entity has failed their due diligence checks.

events.name: platforms.status_changed
events.description: Occurs when the status of a sub-entity has changed.

events.name: platforms.payment_instrument_created
events.description: Occurs when a payment instrument is created associated with a sub-entity.

events.name: platforms.payment_instrument_error
events.description: Occurs when a payment instrument has failed to be created.

events.name: platforms.payment_instrument_verification_passed
events.description: The payment instrument has passed verification.

events.name: platforms.payment_instrument_verification_failed
events.description: The payment instrument has failed verification.

events.name: platforms.transfer_status_changed
events.description: A transfer you have requested has changed status. Read more about this on the checkout.com transfers documentation

events.name: platforms.payout_paid
events.description: A scheduled payout to a sub-entity has been made. Read more about this on the checkout.com sub-entity payouts documentation

events.name: platforms.payout_declined
events.description: A scheduled payout to a sub-entity has failed. Read more about this on the checkout.com sub-entity payouts documentation

events.name: dispute.request_for_information_received
events.description: Occurs when additional information has been requested for a given payment.

events.name: dispute.dispute_received
events.description: Sent when a dispute notification has been received from the scheme before knowing if further action is possible.

events.name: dispute.dispute_resolved
events.description: Occurs when a dispute is received but no further actions is required from you, because you've already refunded the customer.

events.name: dispute.dispute_canceled
events.description: Occurs when a dispute is canceled by the issuing bank. If previously debited, the disputed amount has been credited back to you.

events.name: dispute.dispute_evidence_required
events.description: Occurs when a dispute has been received for which evidence is required.

events.name: dispute.dispute_accepted
events.description: Occurs when you have accepted a dispute. No further action is required.

events.name: dispute.dispute_expired
events.description: Occurs when the time limit to take action against a dispute has been exceeded. No further action is possible.

events.name: dispute.dispute_evidence_submitted
events.description: Occurs once you have submitted evidence for a given dispute. No further action is required from you.

events.name: dispute.dispute_evidence_acknowledged_by_scheme
events.description: Occurs when the supporting documents you sent us have been forwarded to the scheme.

events.name: dispute.dispute_won
events.description: Occurs when the issuing bank has accepted your evidence and you have won the dispute. If previously debited, the amount of the dispute has been credited back to you.

events.name: dispute.dispute_lost
events.description: Occurs when the issuing bank has rejected your evidence and you have lost the dispute.

events.name: dispute.dispute_arbitration_sent_to_scheme
events.description: Occurs when the documentation for an arbitration has been sent to the scheme.

events.name: dispute.dispute_arbitration_won
events.description: Occurs when the arbitration has been won. Your account will be credited the disputed amount.

events.name: dispute.dispute_arbitration_lost
events.description: Occurs when an arbitration has been lost. Your account will be debited any additional arbitration-related fees.

events.name: dispute.dispute_arbitration_lost
events.description: Occurs when an arbitration has been lost. Your account will be debited any additional arbitration-related fees.

events.name: fincrime.payment_compliance_review
events.description: Occurs when a payment is pending while under compliance review.
